acceptance: Inline edit (idea, category, notes) with field-specific editing state
Category field uses dropdown with predefined lowercase options
Notes field supports multiline input and expands row height dynamically
Status is UI-only; not exported to backend
Update/Complete stage only; no network calls until Save
Save exports full array with sequential IDs by created_at asc; status='open'
A11y: aria-sort + live announcements for screen readers
Caching system with staged changes overlay for performance
Force refresh capability via URL parameter
Category-based filtering with dynamic tab generation
Sorting by created_at with dropdown selection
Real-time search filtering across all fields
Webhook integration with fallback to mock data
features: Idea Management: Add, edit, remove ideas with rich text support
Category Filtering: Dynamic tabs based on unique categories
Search & Sort: Real-time filtering and column sorting
Staging System: Batch changes before saving to backend
Caching: Local cache with staged changes overlay
Data Persistence: Webhook integration with localStorage backup
Accessibility: Full keyboard navigation and screen reader support
Performance: Optimistic updates and efficient re-rendering
Field-Specific Editing: Different input types for different fields
Multiline Support: Notes field with dynamic height expansion
state_management: ideas: Array of all idea items
loading: Loading state for data operations
error: Error state for failed operations
sortBy: Current sort column (idea, category, created_at, etc.)
newIdea: New idea form state (idea, category, notes)
data_flow: Load: Cache check → Webhook fetch → Transform → Apply staged changes
Edit: Stage changes → Update local state → Show staged count
Save: Apply staged changes → Serialize → Webhook save → Clear staging
Filter: Apply category + search filters → Sort → Render
integrations: StorageManager: Local data management and persistence
IdeasTable: Main data display and editing component
accessibility: Screen reader announcements for state changes
field_types: idea: Single-line text input with inline editing
notes: Multiline textarea with dynamic height
